text: March 13 ( UPI ) - - Catelynn Lowell praised ` ` amazing'' husband Tyler Baltierra in a post Monday after returning from rehab in February. The 26 - year - old television personality gushed about Baltierra on Twitter following her miscarriage and third stay at a treatment facility. ` ` He really is amazing and my number one supporter,'' she wrote. ` ` he's my best friend and my lover # Soulmates # iLoveYou.'' Lowell returned home Feb. 26 after checking into rehab in January for ` ` trauma.'' She shared an inspirational post with her followers Friday, using the hashtags ` ` KeepTalkingMH,'' or mental health, and ` ` TraumaSurvi
